title: Slow cooker bean and sausage stew
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '450g (1 lb) pork sausages', '1 onion, chopped', '350ml beef stock', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '1 tablespoon hot sauce (optional)', '4 carrots, cut in chunks', '1 (400g) tin chickpeas, drained and rinsed', '1 (400g) tin kidney beans, drained and rinsed']
